name: loco-lib
tagline: A library for distributed L2-penalised estimation problems, implemented in Scala&Spark.
body:
!! Note: This project page is still under development !!

# LOCO<sup>LIB</sup>

## Problem setting

LOCO (add refs to paper) is a distributed algorithm for $ell_2$- penalised convex estimation problems (add formula)

LOCO is suitable in a setting where the number of features $p$ is very large so that splitting the design matrix across features rather than observations is reasonable. For instance, n can be smaller than p or on the same order.

Random projections ... (add figure)
